basics.name: Lyor (Leo) Itzhaki
basics.headline: Growth Product Manager | AI & SaaS Platforms

summary.name: Professional Summary
summary.content: Analytical and scrappy Growth Product Manager with a track record of driving user acquisition, activation, and revenue in SaaS environments. Proven ability to own the full experimentation lifecycle, using SQL and A/B testing to deliver measurable impact, including a ~$3-5M revenue uplift and a 33% CVR increase at TrueML. Passionate about building AI-driven products from 0-to-1 and optimizing user funnels.

items.summary:
Founded an early-stage micro-agency, delivering AI-powered, production-ready MVPs with integrated automation for non-technical founders.

  • Demonstrated a scrappy, resourceful startup mentality by taking ownership of the end-to-end process, from discovery and ideation to building and shipping full-stack AI-driven web apps.

  • Developed and executed a rapid experimentation playbook leveraging reusable components and AI to accelerate MVP builds from weeks to days.

Drove new product direction and prototyped package protection at a post-purchase eCom startup. Launched a revenue-share GTM to increase merchant adoption.

  • Drove a 24% activation rate from targeted merchants for a new SaaS product by designing and launching a revenue-share pilot GTM strategy.

  • Identified key friction points in the user journey by leading discovery, including market analysis and 10+ merchant interviews, to define the MVP for a new revenue pillar.

  • Prototyped and built an LLM-driven claims triage system, demonstrating the potential to automate and scale a core workflow by 40%.

Owned the core payment product for a consumer debt platform. Conducted A/B tests, optimized user flows, and led MFA implementation to increase conversion and payment completion while ensuring compliance.

  • Drove ~$3-5M in annualized revenue by owning the experimentation engine for the core monetization platform; scaled testing to 30+ A/B tests per quarter, lifting checkout CVR by 33% and payment completions by 19%.

  • Increased user activation and engagement by 34% by partnering with Data Science to integrate new behavioral data signals into the user segmentation model.

  • Led a cross-functional team (Eng, Data, Design) to optimize the user journey, reducing checkout time by 15 seconds through a mobile-first redesign.

Set up product ops & support org from scratch at a pre-PM fintech startup. Built SLAs, Looker performance dashboards, and aligned roadmaps across cross-functional teams.

  • Boosted user acquisition and activation, driving a 25% increase in Monthly Active Users (MAU) by developing and executing targeted lifecycle campaigns in HubSpot and Twilio.

  • Built and optimized systems to scale growth efforts, establishing the D2C support function from scratch and creating Looker dashboards to monitor KPIs.

items.name: DebtCat (Founder/Builder)
items.description: Demonstrated full-funnel product ownership by independently building and launching an end-to-end AI-powered consumer fintech platform (Next.js, OpenAI API, Stripe) to solve a real user need.

items.name: FindMe.pet (Founder/Builder)
items.description: Launched an AI pet adoption platform (Next.js, Petfinder API, OpenAI API) designed to improve a core metric (reduce shelter return rates) by analyzing user data to optimize the user journey.
